sentences.sContent: If it isn’t, a second dose of the prostaglandin gel is administered.
sentences.sContent_eng: If it isn’t, a second dose of the prostaglandin gel is administered.
sentences.sCn: 如果还没有开始，会开始使用前列腺素的第二种剂量。

sentences.sContent: One form of this enzyme makes the prostaglandin that causes pain and swelling.
sentences.sContent_eng: One form of this enzyme makes the prostaglandin that causes pain and swelling.
sentences.sCn: 这种酶的一种形态制造了这种能够产生疼痛和扩张的前列腺素。

sentences.sContent: If you cut out sugar, you will be allowing your body to make prostaglandin more effectively.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you cut out sugar, you will be allowing your body to make prostaglandin more effectively.
sentences.sCn: 如果你真的不吃糖了，你的身体将会产生更多的前列腺素。

trans.tranOther: any of a group of potent hormone-like compounds composed of essential fatty acids and found in all mammalian tissues, esp human semen
